[Desc]               <pink>Portia Mason is a short, scrawny 20-year-old woman. She occasionally adjusts her hair, apparently preoccupied with the idea that it's a mess, and frequently glances back and forth nervously. She wears a heavy sweater and denim jeans - nothing particularly interesting, that's for sure. You're not sure exactly why she's here, as she mumbled when she was asked, but you have a good feeling it's not because she thought it would be fun.</pink>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>The shy and scrawny Portia Mason is long gone, and in her place stands the wild woman Luna Mazonia.
